meshIneBits

Class Bit2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • meshIneBits.Bit2D
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NewBit2D

    public class Bit2D
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Serializable
    Bit2D represent a bit in 2D : boundaries and cut path. A Bit3D is build with multiple Bit2D

    We always take the upper left corner as (- bitLength / 2, - bitWidth / 2 ). The bit's normal boundary is a rectangle.
    See Also:
    Bit3D, Serialized Form
